content.detailedDescription:
In 1985 i was in my third year in the u.S. air force at keesler afb, ms. i came home in may to metro detroit, michigan on leave with my one year old son and wife. after a few days of visiting with family and friends i decided to go with a friend to manistee national forest to do some fishing over the weekend. just prior to arriving, my friend and i pulled over at a gas station where he asked me if he could drive my new ford bronco ii the rest of the way to the campground, to which i agreed. approximately 10 minutes after leaving the gas station and with my friend driving at approximately 1:00am, my friend looked in the rear view mirror and asked me "what is that following us?" i then turned around from the passenger seat and looked out the back of the vehicle which was traveling at approximately 45mph. what i witnessed was an "object" that was approximately the size of a two story house with mo descernable outline with thousands of overlapping red lights going on & off at different intrivals, but they were going on & off like "dimmer switches" which created a pulsating appearance. my mind was trying to put it into a catagory of "something." i then turned to my friend and said, "i don't know what the hell it is." i then turned back to the object and noticed four yellow "slits" in the lower left hand corner. they were approximately 4ft long and approximatley 6-8in wide, shaped like eyes with bright yellow lights coming out, stacked one on top of the other, two sets next to each other. as i stared at it, the eye shaped lights became wider at the same time, aproximately 2ft wide for approximately 10 seconds, they then went back to narrow, 6-8in. as i stared at it trying to find a catagory in my mind, it...Disappeared. i then turned around in the passenger seat and didn't say a word and neither did my friend, for approxiamtely 30 seconds. we both started talking at the same time, him saying, "i ain't telling no one" & me saying "i'm telling everyone." to which he said, "no one is going to believe you and they're all going to make fun of you and accuse you of being on drugs, to which i replied, "i don't care, i saw it." immediately after the incident we started noticing deer out in the road, approxiatley 10-15. we had to slow down to 5-10mph to keep from hitting them and as we drove by them, they didn't move.
my friend was right, everyone i told laughed and made fun. even my own wife said, "i believe you saw....Something." this incident as haunted my mind ever since.
20 years after that incident (2005), i was in the approximate area and witnessed "somthing," not of a "unidentified flying" nature, but more of a ? "supernatural" orgin.
content.summary: Manistee national forest, mi.,1985 "something" the size of a house followed my vehicle for approximately 30 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Bright white flash randomly across the sky followed by multiple satellites crisscrossing
content.summary: Bright white flash randomly across the sky followed by multiple satellites crisscrossing direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard with my wife talking enjoying the evening weather when i said to her, look at all the planes coming in. there were 5 lights to begin with, then a bunch of lights (as many as 15) all at one time started to appear. i ran inside and got my camera and snapped a few shots. one photo we can count about 12 lights. i ran upstairs and got the video camera and by the time i got to the upstairs deck they started "burning out" or fading away. they were in the southwest sky traveling east and upwards. this is the usual direction for planes on approach to las vegas from la or burbank. these were not planes because we've never seen that many and we can track the planes across the sky. these lights were going at an angle to the south or upwards. there were also way too many for airlines to be that close together. it made for a interesting night.
content.summary: Several lights (15) or more traveling from sw nnn

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside. at my uncle's house. we had just gotten home from being with family. both my uncle and i observed it. 

saw what appeared to be a plane, but looked more star like and did not blink. was orange colored and when it got far enough away, i saw another orange light appear next to it. both faded out eventually. both looked the same.
content.summary: Saw an orange, star-like light move across the horizon abt. 45 deg, another appeared next to it,

content.detailedDescription: Look like the mothman
content.summary: Monthman

content.detailedDescription: I was sippin a forty when out of the blue triangle ufo zipped landed took a few being and zipped away
content.summary: Very scary

content.detailedDescription: Photographing interesting interesting cloud formation, noticed in photo later.
content.summary: Noticed in photo

content.detailedDescription: Traveling north west on marina drive toward second street, i noticed a blue/red light that was moving oddly.  i asked my wife to look at it and asked her if it looked weird.  it was obvious when we came to the stop light @ marina and second street, that it wasn't flying normal.  it was emitting a red, then blue light and then nothing for about 3 seconds. i have been a fan of aircraft for as long as i can remember and i have never seen an object in the sky maneuver like this one.  it would raise then swiftly move to the right and then kinda of circle eight and then go in the opposite position.  there was low cloud cover and it seemed to be nearly at the clouds height.  my wife actually said "hi alien" and the guy at the light next to us heard her and laughed, as he had been observing it as well while we were waiting at the light.  i am 100% this was not a helicopter.  it was a solitary light source that changed from red to blue to nothing about every 5-10 seconds.  i hope others see these and post.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Long beach odd light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sleeping in backyard under stars looking at stars before falling asleep. observed two starlike light flying parallel to eachother northward. two points of light then executed sudden changes
in direction. one immediately was heading roughly northwest and the other northeast. lights eventually faded out of view due to distance from viewer while on paths that were a perfect right angle from eachother. objects appeared to be in the upper atmosphere and like points of light but not bright due to distance away. objects were not satellites because of their sudden directional change.
content.summary: Two lights traveling traveling north parallel then both turn abruptly 45 degrees away from eachother and continue respective straight line paths

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my 5 minute work break in the afternoon when this happened. i looked up to the sky because i was told a blimp was in town. the object apeared like a dark hawk or large bird just riding the upper currents of wind. it wasn't! no flapping wings, perfect triangle in a cloudless sky. in total disbelief i reach for my phone to get video, but i couldn't take my eyes off the ufo. i haven't even looked at the video yet. this triangle ufo traversed the entire sky in a matter of about 15 seconds and vanished. this defied all logical reasoning. i'm still coming to terms with what i witnessed. i'll check what's on my phone for posting, but the ufo was high in the sky and i seriously doubt it will show up. this happened about 4pm in fayetteville, ar on june 1st 2012. video should give the exact time.
content.summary: Black triangle ufo shot across the sky in broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
1.When i drive in highway, i saw that thing, front near the cloud, size like the moon, 
2.I saw blue sky but only one cloud, and i want to take shoot that moment.
3 i think that is big moon
content.summary: Size like the moon

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting 28 may 2012

we are a 67 & 68-year old couple from jefferson city, mo.
we believe in ufos but have never seen one before this.
we were camping near blue springs, mo this past weekend.
on monday night 28 may 2012 it was getting dark when i
looked up at the sky. i could see the row of satellites but
it was too light to see the stars.
5 minutes later i looked up and saw the brighter stars.
again 5 minutes later i looked up and could see
thousands of stars. i also noticed a jet plane heading
west with its flashing strobe lights. it was about
10 degrees west of straight up, heading west.
i then saw a light going over the jet, a great distance
away, heading east. it was about 50% faster than the
jet. it was a continuous white light as bright as a
bright star and similar in size.
we watched it for the couple of minutes it took to
get to about 30 degrees east from straight up.
the constant bright light turned off. we watched
for a couple more minutes and it did not reappear.
there were no clouds around, the hundreds of stars
around it were always visible.
content.summary: Star-like white light traveling over blue springs, mo high straight 40 degree then light out

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in my driveway when i noticed a glowing orange object come out of a thunderstorm cloud that was south of my position. object kept flying toward me, went over my head and continued heading off to the north. i took out my phone and snapped off pictures of it as it was coming toward me, overhead and moving away. it made no noise and left no smoking trail even though it looked like a fireball. i watched the object till it was no longer visible to me. the object never changed altitude and continued in a straight path to the north. i was fascinated when i looked at the pics though. when i enlarge the pictures on my phone the fireball isn't a fireball it is a glowing orange line that changes shape. if i tilt the phone a little i can make out the outline of the cylinder from the heat source. the glowing line is inside of the cylinder. but that only shows up on my phone, it wont transfer to the computer. my opinion is it was a cloaked object that was struck by lightning. i still have the original pics on my phone if needed.
content.summary: Came out of t-storm in south and flew overhead looked like fireball but never came down

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: These guys have been hovering over the antelope valley for years now. i just found out about you guys and when i saw the news reporting about the ones in blue springs and melbourne i jumped up and cheered!! they flash all kinds of colors and hover in place for hours. right now there is one north east, north, north west of the antelope valley. there are up here almost every single week. i just done have a good enough camera to video shoot them. but if you guys have spotters in the a.V tell them to look up :) they are there
content.summary: Three hovering flashing ufo's same ones being investigated in blue springs and melbourne

content.detailedDescription: Saw light behind cloud cover thought it might be a plane.  i live within ten miles of a major airport. then i realized that it wasn't on any flight path i am used to seeing. i was expecting to see the usual signs of an aircraft as it cleared the cloud cover.  but once it cleared it stayed the same. it appeared as a flame like light with a geometric red aura that resembled a snowflake. once it cleared the cloud cover it appeared to stop mid air, paused then made 90 degree change of direction headed what i think was north then accelerated at a rate of speed that i have never seen before( extremely fast ). the skies were clear of air craft for about two minutes and then i heard what sounded like fast moving jets. shortly after i heard what sounded like jets ( about two minutes ) the normal air traffic i am used to seeing over my house continued.  like i said the flight paths i am used to seeing are very consistent and this was completely out of the usual.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flame like light with geometric red aura that resembled a snowflake

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and two of my neighbors were outside around 9:30 p.M., discussing a previous encounter with an orb. it was clear out. as my neighbor was telling, and showing me what he had seen, out of the corner of my eye i saw a light on the railroad tracks about 75' away. as i looked closer, i noticed it was humanlike. it was about 7-9' tall, and human shaped, an inner light emmited from its chest. it also had long white(?)hair. i instantly said "holy s#!+, look" and pointed at the being, which turned apbruptly and seemed to vanish, speeding accross the tracks. one friend confirmed the same. i teared up instantly afterwords, fearful. all three of us felt uneasy. since this sighting, i have a constant feeling of something watching. my neighbor says he also has had the same feeling.

i don't know what we saw, but i would like to.

even now as i sit and type this, i have tears in my eyes.

help! what did i see??
content.summary: 7-9' glowing entity crossed a set of railroad tracks approx. 75-100' away

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv on my living room couch when i something caught my eye. i turned my attention out my window and saw a glowing orange sphere of light hovering above the tree-line. the light had lit up my kitchen which was directly behind the living room where i was laying, and even my cat had witnessed the light from the window. 
as i observed it further i saw it slowly move along the tree tops to the right and then disappear.
content.summary: Bright orange sphere appeared out living room window, then took off.

content.detailedDescription:
This photo was shot from my back porch, that's how close i am to greene mountain here in greeneville, tn. there was a storm coming and i noticed an unusal amount of clounds rolling down over the mountain so i shot several photos of it.

i did not physically see the object when i shot the photo(s),(i shot at least 20 photos, one right after the other and this object only appeared in this one shot), only after i uploaded it to my computer.
content.summary: I did not actually see the object, i noticed it after i uploaded my photos. i've seen many orbs, and other objects though since and i have photos of them as well.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting down in my backyard on this beautiful and clear late tuesday afternoon, i was looking around at the sky noticing the birds as i often like to do when i'm sitting outside. living in south st. louis, i yet sometimes see one or both of a pair of red-tailed hawks that live in a large cemetery close to my house, and a fairly wide variety of birds (and bats in the evening) for what i would expect living where i do, including hummingbirds. ten days before i'd noticed a very-large "black hawk" and got a picture of it in the distance that no one has yet been able to identify, but could be an immature turkey vulture.

anyways, i was looking up in the sky and peripherally noticed a large black "hawk". pretty much at the moment i then focused right on it, it appeared to be the shape of two triangles connected at one of each's points! it then started darting around in the sky, never moving in curved lines but in straight lines then angles when changing direction. as it was darting around it was moving closer to the ground and seemingly slightly closer to me. i pretty quickly figured it wasn't a bird because i've never seen nor heard of a bird move that way before. its movements were "jerky", where it would move fast, perhaps stop then suddenly change direction and suddenly move fast again, etc. the object appeared to be tumbling or changing shape all along its travel, where i am certain i did see the two-connected triangle shape more than once during its travel, but it seemed to be changing its orientation/shape while moving. in terms of a conventional description, it looked most like a black trash bag being buffeted about by a strong shifting winds storm.

however, there was a very gentile wind mostly perpendicular yet slightly against the direction of the object's travel at the time which i took notice of. i also noticed how black the object was, it never seemed to reflect any kind of sunlight in the clear sky, which made it appear only 2-dimensional as no depth could be perceived of the completely jet black non-reflective surface of the object. i also noticed the speed at which the object took on its longer beelines through the sky. i've seen birds diving, kites diving, radio-controlled planes diving and none of them nor anything else i've ever seen could match the speed it could travel as if on an invisible rail in the sky when going from point to point while constantly changing its orientation/shape. if the object were the size of a large hawk in my relative perspective, i first noticed it about 45 degrees off the horizon at perhaps 300' distance from me point to point. it eventually traveled diagonally down to my right to about 10 degrees off the horizon where i lost it when it went behind some trees heading towards the ground. again, if the object were the size of a large hawk, i last saw it perhaps 200' away, point to point. holding up my hand at the start, the object would have been the width of my pinkie finger, and the width of my ring finger when i last saw it. by that time i had gotten out of my chair and walked to a point in my backyard where i could see it as long as i could from my yard, the total focused visual contact was about 7 - 8 seconds.

i've included an image i created using a picture i took of that area of the sky just five minutes later from my sitting position, and painted in a facsimile of what i saw. i was able to see the object further to the right of what can be seen in the image, having walked to where i could see there during the sighting. the object's path isn't exact either, it probably had a few more twists and turns. a sense of consternation immediately overcame me at the time of the sighting, and hasn't fully left. the night before i witnessed a large object, or fixed set of lights, traverse i-55 in cape girardeau, which i also reported to mufon but also had another witness who also called it/them unidentified. this circumstance took place less than 24 hours later at my house in st. louis but i was the only witness. it is a strange personal co-incidence that when i first noticed it, it bore a resemblance to the black "hawk" i'd recently photographed and have been trying to identify, which i'm also including with this report of the personal co-incidence. knowing that the thing was under control, whether it could be called "intelligent" control, it was not a natural creature nor a conventional object, but my consciousness thought it acted like a "fake" bird, and the object/lights i'd seen the night before my consciousness thought it acted like a "fake" plane. my consternation is that another consciousness may be "messing" with my consciousness!

i make this report not so much for mufon but for you people of the public, those who think that other consciousnesses may be messing with your consciousness. this is aldo to you who think that other people won't/haven't believe/believed you as you may try to recount your own unique personal strange circumstances to your family, friends or even the public :)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Deep black "bird" changes shape while erratically moving at angles

content.detailedDescription: I moved to elgin or resently and i heard noises outside like brakes squeaking and wondered if it was an animal.  so when i turned out the lights to go to bed i looked out the window and noticed and larger than normal star over the next door neighbors garage.  i watched it for a while and noticed it was blinking a lot.  thinking it might be my eyes i just figured it was an airplane and watched it for a while.  i began to move up very slowly, much slower than an airplane usually does and it was still blinking a lot.  it looked like it had colors of at least red and yellow on it. and then it hovered there.  so i thought it might be a helicopter off where i couldn't hear it.  but the blinking bothered me, so i got my bird watching binoculars and focused and then the colored blinking became clear.  there was blue/white light and yellow, green and red.  in the binoculars they looked like orbs  or haloed lights but that could have been the refraction in the lenses from the light.  but there was definitely colors.  i realized that the reason the object looked like it was jerking up and down and side to side slightly was because of the blinking of the lights.  it was hard to tell any shape but the lights were giving it an affect of being cross shaped. i watched it for about 45 minutes after i got the binoculars and the object just hovered there and then about 50 minutes from first sighting it began and slow movement back toward where i had first seen it.  and then it disappeared behind the garage.  i looked later but the clouds had come up and i couldn't see the sky.  there was no noise from it.  all i could hear was the frogs and crickets.  there are no large airports in the area and i suppose sandpoint id is the closest military installation.  i have not heard aircraft fly over since we arrived 2 weeks ago.  i'm not given to flights of fancy or imaginations and i was rather surprised to see something like this.  i still feel there may be an explanation of what it was.
content.summary: Brighter than venus, red, yellow,white, green light giving appearance of jerky movements, moved about 2" up from my view and then hovered and then moved back and disappeared over about and hours time.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my friends back yard smoking a cigarette when i just happened to glance up. i looked at my friend michael and said "what is that?" he looked up and his mouth just dropped we stared at it in silence for a few minutes. i knew it wasn't anything i could explain or had ever seen before. it was hovering and then all of a sudden it took off to the south east and was gone within a matter of seconds. when it was gone michael and i just stated at each other in amazement. then we got excited. it was so close and noticeable we thought someone else had to have seen that. we called a couple local news stations to see if they had heard any other reports. and when nothing turned up we tried to google a ufo research organization and we called one but they never called us back.
content.summary: Bright red pulsating form hovering then took off in the blink of an eye

content.detailedDescription: The object appeared to look like a black rope hovering in the sky above the hudson river. the object appeared straight at first looking like a straight line then it changed shapes turning into a circle, then what looked like the letter m, then an s shape, then looping around itself almost as if were going to tie itself in a knot. it was in the sky for over 15 mins and wasnt affected by the wind it stood stationary while it changed shapes. as i walked closer to the water to observe it i noticed it looked almost like a liquid, it was jet back and as i got to the water and looked up at it again it vanished into thin air as i was looking at it.
content.summary: It looked like a black rope that was hovering in the sky the wind did not affect it then it changed shapes and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Predawn leaving property in a wooded area on sacramento river saw what at first i assumed was a helocopter b/c it was hovering. although it had many more ights than a copter and all around, above and below, with several colors, which i don't exacty recall now, white, blue i recall for sure, perhaps 12 or so lights total. it was shaped not unlike a football but less accentuated "ends," it appeared to be symetrical fron to back top to bottom, although oblong. i jumped from car when i realized not a copter (we have copters for field chemical applications out here)and whistled and waved. it then moved off silently toward the sw at a speed of about 20 mph or so, still noiseless.  i have tried to fit this in a know craft behavior, but i can't, so i give up and am reporting now. 
i can't say why i whistled and waved, except that it was close enough, although still dark out, to see it was solid, close and big and i whistled while it was hovering.  i felt it began to move away after that, it felt like it was in response to my curiosity and had i not jumped out may have had a longer witness.  hard to imagine an alien craft and yet i can't think of any known craft we have that behaves like that.  i want to think it was a helicopter, but it just doesn't fit visually or in it's silence.
content.summary: Predwan craft, large, hovering, when i got out of car and whistled loudly and waved i silently moved off to sw still just above tree tops

content.detailedDescription: This object dimmed out then came to a complete stop and changed direction in a l form it would pulse flash a very bright light and the slowly dim..It look as if evey time it pulsed light it would pick up speed then as light got dim it looked as if it didnt move..So i pointed a 1 watt laser pointer at it and it stopped ...Flashed 3 timesand picked up speed.. it never flashed in a pattern ..Just random..But a slow fade to black after every flash..I have tracked satellites for years..This was out of this world as we know.
content.summary: Looked just like a slow moving satellite ..But then strobed a pure white flash and dimmed out

content.detailedDescription:
On may 31, 2012 at 9:25pm in peoria arizona three witnesses observed two bright orange lights flying silently in an east-to-west trajectory outside their home. 
we were facing north as the "orbs" flew by from west to east (left to right). the lights were bright orange, almost the same color as a street lamp and the light-halo emitting from each object was approximately 10-20ft in diameter. both objects were identical size and shape. the lights did not strobe or flash but remained the same brightness and consistency the whole time. there were no visible wings or landing gear or any other physical characteristics we could see. we did not see any landing lights or flashing strobes. the orbs were flying just above nearby westwing mountain at approximately 500-600 feet altitude. the orbs were independent of each other staying 100 or so feet apart from each other. they were flying at a constant speed of 30-40mph due east under their own power. one orb was about 10 feet higher than the other but both traveled at the same speed. it was very quiet out and no sounds could be heard coming from the objects. the objects continued on their eastern trajectory until eventually one of the objects dimmed and disappeared. the other object remained in view as it continued east for approximately one minute after which it disappeared from view as well. as they were flying away and we could see the rear of the objects they still appeared to be bright orange lights. one of the witnesses filmed the event on a canon powershot sd750 digital camera.
weird. no idea what they were.
content.summary: On may 31 2012 at 9:25pm in peoria arizona three people observed two objects emitting a bright orange light flying in a west-to-east trajectory outsaide their home

content.detailedDescription: I was testing my new sony handycam i just bought at my window which is a 70 times 2000 zoom cam, at 12:34am and just happened to move the cam up a notch and noticed in my viewer of my cam lights fading in and out of view and saw lights of different colors and started recording it,as i noticed it wasn't a plane or anything in the area at the time and was above the moon and knew it wasn't a plane because of the distance. i started recording it because i knew it wasn't anything i ever saw before, i wasn't sure what it was but knew it wasn't a plane or anything else , it just kept fading in and out showing different lights as it did that. i lowered the cam a bit and caught it. i felt kind of freaked out at the time because of what it was and wasn't the only time i recorded something else in the night skies above the moon. it was kind of exciteing knowing that there is something else out there and am still amazed by it. i i tried to zoom in a bit but lost it as i did
content.summary: Had bright colored lights and was fading in and out of camera view

content.detailedDescription:
I have never seen a ufo before and don't know anything about the search for them except for what i've seen on t.V. over the years.  this is just what i saw tonight.  it was definitely the most unusual, interesting and kind of scary thing i have witnessed in the skies. especially when it seemed an airplane was going to crash right into it.   

sent by me to the marin independent journal tonight may 31st around 11p.M. right after i saw event.

i live at marion and 8th street in novato ca  and i just witnessed at about 10:50p.M.  two fiery red objects very large in appearance heading south-west to north-east direction.  these were nothing like anything i've ever seen before. they came 2 minutes apart and glided through the sky making no noise whatsoever.  i believe it was not in any standard flight path.  in fact, the second one went right past an airplane which was going in the direction of sfo.  the airplane was very audible but the fiery thing was not. very interesting occurence; i hope someone can explain it, i'd be thrilled to know what they were because they were kind of majestic as well.  i caugth it on cell phone video but i can't download it right now.  email me if you would like it.  

sent to the local mufon chapter same time:


 i just saw two very unsual objets glide slowly across the sky over novato in a northeasterly direction. they arrived about two minutes apart and were bright bright orange like fireballs,. oi don't know much about meteors but i went to a meteor reporting website and everythinkg there was reported as being blue or green or multi colored and having a tail and burning out and etc. these objects lost no intensity of color. that stayed the same as they each kept going until they disappeared into the horizon. they were off of flight paths i'm sure. in fact the second one passed right past an airplane headed easterly toward sfo or oakland airports. another strange thing. they made no noise whatsoever. i have cell phone video but its not very good. i would love to have someone analyze it 

or even better, if anyone else saw it how can i connect. thanks.
content.summary: Like fireballs but def not meteors, bright fire that never faded. seemed on a flight path.  crossed paths with an airplane.
